template<typename MatrixType >
void cusp::io::read_matrix_market_file ( MatrixType &  mtx,
const std::string &  filename 
) [inline]

read_matrix_market_file : Read a MatrixMarket file

Parameters:
mtx a matrix container (e.g. csr_matrix or coo_matrix)
filename file name of the MatrixMarket file
Template Parameters:
MatrixType matrix container
Note:
any contents of mtx will be overwritten
 #include <cusp/io/matrix_market.h>
 #include <cusp/coo_matrix.h>
 
 int main(void)
 {
     // read matrix stored in A.mtx into a coo_matrix
     cusp::coo_matrix<int, float, cusp::device_memory> A;
     cusp::io::read_matrix_market_file(A, "A.mtx");
 
     return 0;
 }
See also:
write_matrix_market_file

std::istream &  input 
) [inline]

read_matrix_market_stream : Read MatrixMarket data from a stream.

Parameters:
mtx a matrix container (e.g. csr_matrix or coo_matrix)
input a std::istream from which to read the data
Template Parameters:
MatrixType matrix container
Note:
any contents of mtx will be overwritten
 #include <cusp/io/matrix_market.h>
 #include <cusp/coo_matrix.h>
 
 int main(void)
 {
     // read matrix stored in A.mtx into a coo_matrix
     cusp::coo_matrix<int, float, cusp::device_memory> A;
     cusp::io::read_matrix_market_stream(A, std::cin);
 
     return 0;
 }

template<typename MatrixType >
void cusp::io::write_matrix_market_file ( const MatrixType &  mtx,
const std::string &  filename 
) [inline]

write_matrix_market_file : Write a MatrixMarket file

Parameters:
mtx a matrix container (e.g. csr_matrix or coo_matrix)
filename file name of the MatrixMarket file
Template Parameters:
MatrixType matrix container
Note:
if the file already exists it will be overwritten
 #include <cusp/io/matrix_market.h>
 #include <cusp/array2d.h>
 
 int main(void)
 {
     // create a simple example
     cusp::array2d<float, cusp::host_memory> A(3,4);
     A(0,0) = 10;  A(0,1) =  0;  A(0,2) = 20;  A(0,3) =  0;
     A(1,0) =  0;  A(1,1) = 30;  A(1,2) =  0;  A(1,3) = 40;
     A(2,0) = 50;  A(2,1) = 60;  A(2,2) = 70;  A(2,3) = 80;
 
     // save A into MatrixMarket file
     cusp::io::write_matrix_market_file(A, "A.mtx");
 
     return 0;
 }
See also:
read_matrix_market_file
read_matrix_market_stream
template<typename MatrixType >
void cusp::io::write_matrix_market_stream ( const MatrixType &  mtx,
const std::string &  filename 
) [inline]

write_matrix_market_stream : Write MatrixMarket data to a stream.

Parameters:
mtx a matrix container (e.g. csr_matrix or coo_matrix)
output a std::ostream to which data will be written
Template Parameters:
MatrixType matrix container
 #include <cusp/io/matrix_market.h>
 #include <cusp/array2d.h>
 
 int main(void)
 {
     // create a simple example
     cusp::array2d<float, cusp::host_memory> A(3,4);
     A(0,0) = 10;  A(0,1) =  0;  A(0,2) = 20;  A(0,3) =  0;
     A(1,0) =  0;  A(1,1) = 30;  A(1,2) =  0;  A(1,3) = 40;
     A(2,0) = 50;  A(2,1) = 60;  A(2,2) = 70;  A(2,3) = 80;
 
     // save A into MatrixMarket file
     cusp::io::write_matrix_market_stream(A, std::cout);
 
     return 0;
 }
